title: Scalabilty with zKSNARKs
description: Scalabilty with zKSNARKsThis session will introduce iden3â€™s zkSNARKs implementation and how it will be used at two scenarios: For the trustless relayer implementation at the identity management environment, allowing the identities to perform claims without cost at big scale.And the rollup project for Ethereum scalability, allowing verifiable computation off-chain to increase transaction throughput
